while true do
wait(0.1)
local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new(5889,8,4855)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

local args = {
    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "EarthQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 1
    }
}

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NetworkFolder.GameFunction:InvokeServer(unpack(args))

wait(1.25)

local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new(6391, 8, 5252)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

local args = {
    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "EarthQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 2
    }
}

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NetworkFolder.GameFunction:InvokeServer(unpack(args))

wait(1.25)

local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new(5589, 8, 5111)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "EarthQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 3

local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)

wait(0.5)

    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "EarthQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 4
    }
}

local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new(6154, 161, -6244)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)
-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

local args = {
    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "FireQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 1
    }
}

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NetworkFolder.GameFunction:InvokeServer(unpack(args))

wait(1.25)

local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new (1726, 19, 1665)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

-- Script generated by SimpleSpy - credits to exx#9394

local args = {
    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "FireQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 2
    }
}

wait(1.25)
local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new(6154, 161, -6244)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "FireQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 3
    }
}

wait(1.25)
local pl = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.HumanoidRootPart
local location = CFrame.new (1726, 19, 1665)
local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)
wait(0.1)
pl.CFrame = location

wait(0.5)

    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "FireQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 4
    }

local humanoid = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid
humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping)

    [1] = "AdvanceStep",
    [2] = {
        ["QuestName"] = "FireQuest2",
        ["Step"] = 5
    }
}

game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage").NetworkFolder.GameFunction:InvokeServer(unpack(args))
end
